sentences.en: anyone who tries to cut across our policies should butt out.
sentences.cn: 任何想阻碍我方政策的人都得住手。

sentences.en: Frieda grinned, pinching him on the butt.
sentences.cn: 弗里达咧嘴笑了，捏了捏他的屁股。

sentences.en: Get off your butt and do some work!
He dropped his cigarette butt into the street below.
sentences.cn: 他把烟头扔到下面的街道上。

sentences.en: He is still the butt of cruel jokes about his humble origins.
sentences.cn: 他仍然因出身低微而被人无情嘲笑。

sentences.en: He paused to stub out the butt of his cigar.
sentences.cn: 他停下来，踩灭了手中的烟头。

sentences.en: He threw his cigarette butt down and stamped it out.
sentences.cn: 老人把香烟头扔在地下,踏上鞋底,把它踩灭.

sentences.en: He was going to butt in when his mother darted a look of disapproval at him.
sentences.cn: 他刚要插嘴,妈妈瞥了他一眼.

sentences.en: He was the butt of their jokes.
His mouth was all puffed up where he had taken a rifle butt.
sentences.cn: 他的嘴上挨了枪托的地方都肿了起来。

sentences.en: Lawrence kept on butting me but the referee did not warn him.
sentences.cn: 劳伦斯不断用头撞我，可裁判没有警告他。

sentences.en: She threw the cigarette butt into the ashtray.
She would have liked to tell him to butt out.
sentences.cn: 她本想告诉他叫他别插手的。

sentences.en: Sorry, I don't mean to butt in.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我并不是想插嘴。

sentences.en: The butt of a rifle had been used to bash in his skull.
sentences.cn: 他的头骨是被来复枪的枪托砸伤的。

sentences.en: The time has come for parents to butt out of the adolescent's daily life.
sentences.cn: 到了让父母别再干预未成年子女日常生活的时候了。

sentences.en: The water butt catches the overflow from this pipe.
sentences.cn: 大水桶盛接管子里流出的东西.

words.tran_cn: 屁股；烟头；笑柄；靶垛；粗大的一端

phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)冲突；与…严重分歧
管闲事，插手，干涉：介入或干预别人的事
用头撞击；头击，用脑袋撞

trans.tran_en: a large round container for collecting or storing liquids
to hit or push against something or someone with your head
